name: Blender
title: A visual cheat-sheet for the 187 keyboard shortcuts found in Blender

cards.title: Intro
cards.body: A visual cheat-sheet for the 187 keyboard shortcuts found in Blender

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Cancels Blender functions without changes

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Open the toolbox

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Start or quit edit mode

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Loads a Blender file, changes the window to a file window

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Appends parts from other files, or loads as library data

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Writes a Blender file, changes the window to a file window

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Exports the scene as a DXF file

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Exports the scene as a VRML1 file

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Writes a picture, if a picture has been rendered, and the file format is as indicated in the display buttons

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Saves a screen dump of the active window

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Saves a screen dump of the whole Blender screen

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Displays the logic context

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Displays the shading context, light, material, or world sub-contexts

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Displays the shading context and texture sub-context

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Displays the object context

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Displays the shading context and world sub-context

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Displays the editing context

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Displays the scene context

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Hides or shows the render window

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Starts the rendering from the active camera

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Go to the previous frame

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Go to the first frame

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Go to the next frame

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Go to the last frame

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Go forward 10 frames

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Go back 10 frames

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Change the current Blender window to animation playback mode, the cursor changes to a counter

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Change the current window and all 3D windows to animation playback mode

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Insert key menu, this menu differs from window to window

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Toggle the render buffers

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Opens the last saved file

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Quit Blender

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Timer menu, this menu offers access to information about drawing speed

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Save user defaults, current project settings are written to the default file that will be loaded every time you start Blender

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Write file without opening a file window

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Write videoscape file

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Erase everything except the render buffer, the default scene is reloaded

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Redo

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Undo

cards.title: Universal
cards.back: Redo

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: All objects in the visible layer are displayed completely, centered in the window

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Select the next object key, if more than one is selected the selection is shifted up cyclically

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Add to selection the next object key

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Select the previous object key, if more than one is selected the selection is shifted up cyclically

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Adds to selection the previous object key

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Select all layers

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Revert to the previous layer setting

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Start or stop edit mode

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Selects or deselects all

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Apply size and rotation

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: If the active object is automatically duplicated, brings up a menu for actually creating the objects

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Brings up the add menu, the toolbox items that start with ADD

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Border select, draws a rectangle with the left mouse to select objects

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Render border, this only works in camera view mode

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Center view, the position of the 3D cursor becomes the new center of the 3D window

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Convert menu, depending on the active object a popup menu is displayed enabling you to convert certain types of ObData

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Copy menu, this menu copies information from the active object to selected objects

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Center zero view, the 3D cursor is set to zero and the view is changed so all objects can be displayed

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Display draw mode menu

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Add duplicate, the selected objects are duplicated

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Add linked duplicate, linked duplicates of the selected objects are created

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Draw the texture image as wire

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Start or stop edit mode

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: If selected object is a mash, toggles face select mode on or off

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Sort faces, the faces of the active mesh object are sorted based on the current view in the 3D window

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Grab mode, or translation mode

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Clears translations, given in grab mode

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Group selection

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Insert object key, a keyposition is inserted in the current frame of all selected objects

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Join objects, all selected objects of the same type are added to the active object

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Show keys, the draw key option is turned on for all selected objects

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Display popup menu for showing and selecting all keys

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Makes selected object local, makes library linked objects local for the current scene

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Link selected, links some of the active object data to all selected objects

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Select linked, selected all objects somehow linked to the active object

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Move selected objects to another layer

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Mirror menu, it is possible to mirror an object along the X, Y, or Z axis

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Number panel, the location, rotation, and scaling of the active object are displayed and can be modified

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Clear origin, the origin is erased for all child objects, which causes them to move ot the exact location of the parent objects

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: If the selected object is a mesh, toggles the subsurf on or off

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Make selected objects the children of the active object

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Clears parent relation, user is asked if they wish to keep or clear parent-induced transforms

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Rotate mode, works on selected objects

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Clears rotation, the X, Y, and Z rotations of selected objects are set to zero

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Size mode or scaling mode, works on selected objects

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Clears size, the X, Y, and Z dimensions of selected objects are set to 1

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Opens the snap menu

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Texture space mode, the position of dimensions of the texture space for the selected objects can be changed in the same manner for grab and size mode

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Makes selected objects track the active object

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Clears old style track, constraint track is removed as all constrains are

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Makes object single user, the inverse operation of link

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Switches in and out of vertex paint mode

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Object image aspect, this hotkey sets the X and Y dimensions of the selected objects in relation to the dimensions of the image texture they have

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Opens the object booleans menu

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Deletes selected objects

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Toggles solid mode on or off

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Toggles shaded mode on or off

cards.title: Object Mode
cards.back: Toggles textured mode on or off

cards.title: Edit Mode - General
cards.back: Start or stop edit mode

cards.title: Edit Mode - General
cards.back: Start or stop edit mode (alternative)

cards.title: Edit Mode - General
cards.back: Switches between vertex select, edge select, and face select modes

cards.title: Edit Mode - General
cards.back: Select or unselect all

cards.title: Edit Mode - General
cards.back: Circle select

cards.title: Edit Mode - General
cards.back: With vertices selected, this creates a hook object

cards.title: Edit Mode - General
cards.back: Number panel, simpler than the object mode one

cards.title: Edit Mode - General
cards.back: Switch in and out of proportional editing

cards.title: Edit Mode - General
cards.back: Toggles between smooth and sharp proportional editing

cards.title: Edit Mode - General
cards.back: Separate, you can choose to make a new object with all selected vertices, edges, faces, and curves

cards.title: Edit Mode - General
cards.back: Make vertex parent

cards.title: Edit Mode - General
cards.back: Shear, in edit mode this operation enables you to make selected forms slant

cards.title: Edit Mode - General
cards.back: Undo

cards.title: Edit Mode - General
cards.back: Displays specials popup menu

cards.title: Edit Mode - General
cards.back: Warp, selected vertices can be bent into curves with this option

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Adds to selection all vertices connected by an edge to an already selected vertex

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Removes from selection all vertices of the outer ring of selected vertices

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: If using curve deformation, toggles the curve cyclic mode on or off

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Extrude selected

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Crease subsurf edge

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Mark LSCM seam

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Make edge or face

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Fill selected, all selected vertices that are bound by edges and form a closed polygon are filled with triangular faces

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Beauty fill, edges of all selected triangular faces are switched so equally sized faces are formed

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Flip faces, selected triangular faces are paired and common edge of each pair swapped

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Hide selected, all selected vertices and faces are hidden

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Hide not selected, all non-selected vertices and faces are hidden

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Reveal, all hidden vertices and faces are drawn again

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Join faces, selected triangular faces are joined in pairs and transformed to quads

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Knife tool menu

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Select linked

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Deselect linked

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Select linked selected

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Mirror, opens a popup asking for the axis to mirror

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Merges selected vertices as barycentrum or at cursor depending on selection made on popup

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Calculate normals outside

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Calculate normals inside

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Scales each vertex in the direction of its local normal

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Make triangles, all selected faces are converted to triangles

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Undo

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Redo

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Undo menu

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Special menu

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Erase selected

cards.title: Edit Mode - Mesh
cards.back: Split, this command splits the selected part of a mesh without deleting faces

cards.title: Edit Mode - Curve
cards.back: Set the selected curves to cyclic or turn cyclic off

cards.title: Edit Mode - Curve
cards.back: Extrude curve

cards.title: Edit Mode - Curve
cards.back: Add segment, a segment is added between two selected vertices at the end of two curves

cards.title: Edit Mode - Curve
cards.back: Toggle handle align or free

cards.title: Edit Mode - Curve
cards.back: Set handle to auto

cards.title: Edit Mode - Curve
cards.back: Calculate handles

cards.title: Edit Mode - Curve
cards.back: Select linked

cards.title: Edit Mode - Curve
cards.back: Deselect linked

cards.title: Edit Mode - Curve
cards.back: Mirror selected control points exactly as for vertices in a mesh

cards.title: Edit Mode - Curve
cards.back: Tilt mode, specify an extra axis rotation for each vertex in a 3D curve

cards.title: Edit Mode - Curve
cards.back: Clear tilt

cards.title: Edit Mode - Curve
cards.back: Vector handle

cards.title: Edit Mode - Curve
cards.back: The special menu for curves appears

cards.title: Edit Mode - Curve
cards.back: Erase selected

cards.title: Edit Mode - Surface
cards.back: Toggle cyclic menu

cards.title: Edit Mode - Surface
cards.back: Extrude selected

cards.title: Edit Mode - Surface
cards.back: Add segment, a segment is added between two selected vertices at the end of two curves

cards.title: Edit Mode - Surface
cards.back: Select linked

cards.title: Edit Mode - Surface
cards.back: Deselect linked

cards.title: Edit Mode - Surface
cards.back: Mirror selected control points exactly as for vertices in a mesh

cards.title: Edit Mode - Surface
cards.back: Select row, starting with the last selected vertex

cards.title: Edit Mode - Surface
cards.back: The special menu for surfaces appears

cards.title: Edit Mode - Surface
cards.back: Erase selected

cards.title: Edit Mode - Font
cards.back: Move text cursor one position forward

cards.title: Edit Mode - Font
cards.back: Move text cursor to the end of the line

cards.title: Edit Mode - Font
cards.back: Move text cursor one position backwards

cards.title: Edit Mode - Font
cards.back: Move text cursor to the start of the line

cards.title: Edit Mode - Font
cards.back: Move text cursor one line forward

cards.title: Edit Mode - Font
cards.back: Move text cursor to the end of the text

cards.title: Edit Mode - Font
cards.back: Move text cursor one line back

cards.title: Edit Mode - Font
cards.back: Move text cursor to the beginning of the text

cards.title: Edit Mode - Font
cards.back: Reload original data

cards.title: Edit Mode - Font
cards.back: Paste text

cards.title: VertexPaint
cards.back: All vertex colors are erased, they are changed to the current drawing color

cards.title: VertexPaint
cards.back: Undo, press twice redos the undone

cards.title: VertexPaint
cards.back: Shared vertexcol, the colors of all faces that share vertices are blended

cards.title: UV Editor
cards.back: LSCM unwrapping, launches on the faces visible in the UV editor

cards.title: UV Editor
cards.back: Pin selected vertices, they will stay in place on the UV editor when executing an LSCM unwrap

cards.title: UV Editor
cards.back: Un-pin selected vertices

cards.title: FaceSelect
cards.back: Switches to edit mode

cards.title: FaceSelect
cards.back: With multiple, co-planar faces selected, this will merge them into one FGon so long as they remain co-planar

cards.title: FaceSelect
cards.back: Select linked UVs

cards.title: FaceSelect
cards.back: Calls a menu allowing to rotate the UV coordinates or the vertex col

cards.title: FaceSelect
cards.back: Calls the UV Calculation menu
